item.title: 🟡 18:03 Flashing anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marhanetsky Territorial Community- Mirorsk Territorial Community- Chervonohrigor Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 18:03 Flashing anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marhanetsky Territorial Community- Mirorsk Territorial Community- Chervonohrigor Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
